name: Smart Company Software
overview:
Smart Company Software is a small privately held software company located in the beautiful city of Perth, Western Australia. We specialize in high quality database software for businesses of any size. We design and develop software to very high standards and use the very latest Microsoft technologies.

We have a team of very experienced software developers and user interface designers who have a passion for creating software. We have an extremely agile working style that enables us to develop software quickly, yet still maintain the stellar standards that we set ourself.

At Smart Company Software we are passionate about developing smart software for smart companies, and we continually strive for excellence which we believe is clearly demonstrated in the software we sell.

We take extreme pride in our work and out goal is to make the customer happy, because if the customer isn’t happy, then we are not happy.
